oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Joseph Marion Dixon Cates and family members
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured in front of the family home are Elder Joseph Marion Dixon Cates, Mary Jane Taylor, Leona Lorena Cates (Elliot), Charles Taylor Cates, and a hired worker. The home was in Cateston, southwest of Woodbury. Only a cemetery remains of the town now. Cates published the Baptist Messenger, state Baptist paper from his house. His son Adolphus B. Cates initially opposed the war, but served as a captain, 9th Tenn. Cav., CSA.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cates, J. M. D. (Joseph Marion Dixon), 1815-1887;Taylor, Mary Jane;Elliot, Leona Cates;Cates, Charles T.
